product_name: Seattle Sports Tri-Way LashMate Mini Bungee Deck Kit
long_description: The Seattle Sports Tri-Way LashMate Mini Bungee Deck Kit is the best way to add versatile rigging to your fiberglass or plastic paddle board, surfboard, kayak, canoe, and more.
